definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: CATV signals travel strightyly high up into the space from TV stations.
sentences.chinese: 有線電視信號從電視臺直接送入空間。

sentences.english: Introduce the idea and project of CATV fibre-optical netting in urban and rural areas in Ninghua.
sentences.chinese: 介紹寧化縣城鄉有線電視光纖聯網設計思想和方案。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a remote meter -reading system based on CATV broad band network.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於有線電視寬帶網的遠方抄表系統。

sentences.english: In this respect, think of it as cable television without the need for a set-top-box.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，可以把它看作不需要機頂盒的有線電視。

sentences.english: He met K'naan when they worked on a cable TV show together.
sentences.chinese: 在一次爲有線電視節目工作時，他認識了克南。

sentences.english: They also face the challenge of competing against more risque fare available on cable channels, such as HBO.
sentences.chinese: 他們也面臨與有線電視頻道上更多所帶來的挑戰。

sentences.english: These people are actually proud to cancel their cable TV service.
sentences.chinese: 這些人事實上已經以退掉有線電視服務爲傲。

sentences.english: Last week, the cable service technician arrived at our door.
sentences.chinese: 上週，有線電視的技術員來上門服務。
削減你的有線電視電纜。

sentences.english: CATV is a short way saying "community antenna television".
sentences.chinese: 有線電視是一小段路說“社區天線電視”。

sentences.english: Some cable TV companies offer TV5 or other French stations.
sentences.chinese: 一些有線電視公司也播出TV5臺或其他法語臺。

sentences.english: The real wild card in this battle will be the efforts of the cable and telecom companies.
sentences.chinese: 這場戰役中的百搭牌將是有線電視和電信公司。

sentences.english: Offers easy access to selected Cable TV channels to support teaching, learning and other work-related activities.
sentences.chinese: 提供部份有線電視頻道，支援教學與其他相關活動。

sentences.english: CATV worked well, and soon new uses were found for it.
sentences.chinese: 有線電視合作得很好，很快就發現了新用途。

sentences.english: Will And I'm paying good money for cable.
sentences.chinese: 威爾我還花大筆錢裝有線電視哩。

sentences.chinese: 全球有線電視機頂盒市場研究報告。
